duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform detailed requirements analysis and create and maintain relevant product/project documentation.
Conduct user acceptance testing and document defects.
Work with digital platforms and tools, establish continuous improvement/delivery pipeline, and stay up to date on the latest process and IT advancements.
Communicate and collaborate with state-wide partners, clear challenges for team members, and juggle multiple project workstreams.
Support teammates' skills and behaviors development and delivery, balance domain expertise and flexibility, and deal effectively and diplomatically with all levels of government staff.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Information Technology, or a related field (Master's preferred)
